title: If art is how we express our humanity, where does AI fit in?
summary: A group of researchers from MIT have published a commentary article in Science, discussing the immediate impact of generative AI on creative work and society. They highlight the need for interdisciplinary research and discussions about the ethical implications of AI technologies. The researchers emphasize the importance of understanding the generative process, addressing issues of ownership and credit, considering the impact on labor and creativity, and safeguarding against AI-generated misinformation. They hope to start a conversation and build a roadmap for understanding and utilizing AI technologies in a beneficial way.
